descriptionHtml:
Unlock the full potential of the dovahkiin! Don\'t waste your breath on enemies, when you can shoot it out of your hand! This mod replaces the wall of storms, wall of fire, and wall of frost spells with some dragon shouts, just hold down the button for unlimited shouts (they are sustainable, not projectiles.)

Edit: I re-uploaded this, because an admin deleted it (probably from the comments, I\'m sorry) and I re-uploaded it because I thought some people might enjoy it.  Ok, as requested they are now separate spells, and do not replace anything, to find them, open the console and type, \"help true 0\" without the quotes. Then use the command, \"player.addspell xxxxxxx\" (where xxxxxxx = whatever number the spell is). I am not sure if the fire spell works, but I know the ice and force ones do. I am currently still working on improving them.
Endorse if you like it!
author: Vandorin
